name: URL
Clean
Parse HTML
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.replace(/<style((.|\n)*?)<\/style>/gim, ""); // Remove <style> tags
msg.payload = msg.payload.replace(/<script((.|\n)*?)<\/script>/gim, ""); // Remove <script> tags
msg.payload = msg.payload.replace(/>(.{0,200})</gim, "><"); // Remove all text shorter than 100 characters
msg.payload = msg.payload.replace(/<((.|\n)*?)>/gim, ""); // Remove all HTML tags
msg.payload = msg.payload.replace(/\n/gim, " "); // Remove newlines
msg.payload = msg.payload.replace(/\t/gim, " "); // Remove tabs
msg.payload = msg.payload.replace(/(.)\1\1/gim, ""); // Remove all characters that repeat 3 times or more
msg.payload = msg.payload.replace(/(.)\1\1/gim, ""); // Remove all characters that repeat 3 times or more
msg.payload = msg.payload.replace(/(.)\1\1/gim, ""); // Remove all characters that repeat 3 times or more
msg.payload = msg.payload.replace(/(.)\1\1/gim, ""); // Remove all characters that repeat 3 times or more
msg.payload = msg.payload.replace(/(.)\1\1/gim, ""); // Remove all characters that repeat 3 times or more
msg.payload = msg.payload.replace(/(.)\1\1/gim, ""); // Remove all characters that repeat 3 times or more
msg.payload = msg.payload.substr(0, 500);

return msg;
